src:
20+ Famous Beautiful Women Who Have Aged Gracefully

07 Nov 2019, 01:30

Setting fire to the old saying “men age like wine, women age like milk,” some women are making a statement by only getting better with age. From Halle Berry to Julie Andrews, these fierce women are aging gracefully and proving to be great role models.
We at Bright Side have put together a list of these gorgeous women who are aging like fine wine and are glad to share it with you.
1. Cindy Crawford — 53 years old


© Images Press / Archive Photos/ Getty Images   © cindycrawford / Instagram  

2. Jennifer Lopez — 50 years old


© The Wedding Planner / Sony Pictures   © jlo / Instagram  

3. Julia Roberts — 52 years old


© GP/MPI/Capital Pictures/Capital Pictures/East News   © USA TODAY Network/Sipa USA/East News  

4. Angela Bassett — 61 years old


© Boyz n the Hood / Sony Pictures   © Xavier Collin/Image Press Agency/BWP Media/East News  

5. Goldie Hawn — 73 years old


© Wildcats / Warner Bros   © Jaxon / MEGA/EAST NEWS  

6. Halle Berry — 53 years old


© halleberry / Instagram   © halleberry / Instagram  

7. Jessica Lange — 70 years old


© Tootsie / Sony Pictures   © ANGELA WEISS/AFP/East News  

8. Julie Andrews — 84 years old


© East News   © Byron Purvis/AdMedia/Sipa USA/East News  

9. Meryl Streep — 70 years old


© Sophie's Choice / Universal Studios   © Invision/Invision/East News  

10. Michelle Pfeiffer — 61 years old


© michellepfeifferofficial / Instagram   © michellepfeifferofficial / Instagram  

11. Joan Collins — 86 years old


© Bettmann / Bettmann/ Getty Images   © joancollinsdbe / Instagram  

12. Madonna — 61 years old


© CAP/RFS/Capital Pictures/East News   © madonna / Instagram  

13. Jane Fonda — 81 years old


© ASSOCIATED PRESS/East News   © Gilbert Flores/Broadimage/Broad Image/East News  

14. Naomi Watts — 51 years old


© Mulholland Drive / Universal Pictures   © Quinn Jones/AFF-USA.com / MEGA/Mega Agency/East News  

15. Elizabeth Hurley — 54 years old


© Bedazzled / 20th Century Fox   © elizabethhurley1 / Instagram  

16. Sharon Stone — 61 years old


© Sharon Stone / Instagram   © Sharon Stone / Instagram  

17. Gwen Stefani — 50 years old


© gwenstefani / Instagram   © gwenstefani / Instagram  

18. Betty White — 97 years old


© Image supplied by Capital Pictures/EAST NEWS   © EAST NEWS  

19. Jennifer Aniston — 50 years old


© EAST NEWS   © jenniferaniston / Instagram  

20. Rachel Weisz — 49 years old


© Definitely Maybe / Universal Pictures   © IMP FEATURES/East News  

21. Jamie Lee Curtis — 60 years old


© Fierce Creatures / Universal Pictures   © curtisleejamie / Instagram  

22. Queen Elizabeth II — 93 years old


© Bettmann / Bettmann/ Getty Images   © theroyalfamily / Instagram  

Which of these wonderful ladies do you think looks best for her age? Who is your role model? Let us know in the comments!
Preview photo credit ASSOCIATED PRESS/East News, Gilbert Flores/Broadimage/Broad Image/East News
